title: Tokyo Olympics: Sprinter Krystsina Tsimanouskaya seeks asylum in Poland amid standoff with Belarus
content:
1. Tokyo Olympics: Sprinter Krystsina Tsimanouskaya seeks asylum in Poland amid standoff with Belarus  Global News
  2. Belarusian sprinter 'safe' in Japan, granted Polish visa after home country allegedly tried to forcefully remove her from Olympics  Yahoo Sports
  3. Opinion | Olympic sprinter Krystsina Tsimanouskaya takes a stand and reminds us of Belarus's injustices  The Washington Post
  4. The Guardian view on Belarus: an Olympic athlete joins the exodus  The Guardian
  5. Belarusian athlete accuses home team of forcing her out of Tokyo Olympics after criticising coach  South China Morning Post

localize.title: 東京オリンピック。スプリンターのKrystsina Tsimanouskayaは、ベラルーシとの睨み合いの中、ポーランドへの亡命を希望。
东京奥运会。在与白俄罗斯的对峙中，短跑运动员Krystsina Tsimanouskaya在波兰寻求庇护
東京奧運會。在與白俄羅斯的對峙中，短跑運動員Krystsina Tsimanouskaya在波蘭尋求庇護
